general_advisory: Dry weather conditions with clear skies are expected. Increasing temperature may necessitate irrigation in standing crops. Various pest management and disease control measures are recommended for different crops. FMD vaccination for cattle and poultry disease prevention are advised.

advisory: In transplanted paddy to control grasses, sedges, and broadleaf weeds, spray Bispyribac Sodium 10% E.C.
Must use specified pesticides at recommended stages to prevent pest infestations.
To manage Bud Necrosis, spray Neem Based Pesticide or chemical insecticides.
Recommended pest control measures at pegging to pod formation stage.
For sett rot management, apply specified chemicals after planting.
Follow recommended disease control measures for a healthy crop.
